data.name: Ultimate Fight Manager 2016
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the Ultimate Fight Manager 2016 Early Access

We decided to enter Early Access with a fairly incomplete game. The reason for this is that we want to get feedback early in the process to be able to implement requests and ideas from the community.

With that said, please keep in mind that the game is fairly incomplete at the time of the Early Access launch. We will provide weekly updates, so you'll know exactly what we are working on and how far we have come in the process of completing our tasks.
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to the Ultimate Fight Manager 2016 Early Access

We decided to enter Early Access with a fairly incomplete game. The reason for this is that we want to get feedback early in the process to be able to implement requests and ideas from the community.

With that said, please keep in mind that the game is fairly incomplete at the time of the Early Access launch. We will provide weekly updates, so you'll know exactly what we are working on and how far we have come in the process of completing our tasks.
data.short_description: Welcome to soon to be the most realistic, in-depth and immersive simulation MMA management game! Ultimate fight manager is the definitive MMA management game. Build your gym and stable of fighters from the ground up, in the pursuit to become the premier MMA gym in the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 64bit only
  • Процессор: Intel Core i3 1.8Ghz or similiar
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Intel HD3000 or similar
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 100 MB
  • Звуковая карта: YES
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 64bit only
  • Процессор: Intel Core i3 1.8Ghz or similiar
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Intel HD3000 or similar
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 100 MB
  • Звуковая карта: Yes
